item.title: Apprentice Banker (Level 1)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 1)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Fisherman (Level 1)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 1)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 1)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 1)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Garage Inventor
item.description: Used a custom alias for a Git command

item.title: Student
item.description: Accessed the documentation for a command with git [command] --help
